item.title: Is the iOS Shortcuts app Turing-complete?
item.author: noah@noahpeeters.de (Noah Peeters)
item.description: The short answer: Yes. The Long Answer In this post, we will explore how to create a Turing machine in the iOS Shortcut app. The Shortcuts app is intended to define more or less complex workflows to simplify repetitive day-to-day tasks. The usual applications range from simple water loggers to more complete morning routines which inform the user about the weather and the upcoming appointments. But we have a slightly different goal.
